title: Roasted Buffalo Chickpeas + Buffalo Chickpea Salad
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with foil and spray with olive oil cooking spray. Set aside.
2. In a small bowl, combine buffalo sauce, onion powder, garlic powder, and black pepper. Whisk until well-combined.
3. Stir in chickpeas and coat evenly.
4. Pour chickpeas onto the baking sheet in an even layer.
5. Roast the chickpeas for 15 minutes, remove from the oven, toss, and continue roasting for an additional 5 to 10 minutes. Your chickpeas are finished with they are slightly crispy and crunchy!
ingredients: 1 15 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
2 to 3 TB of your favorite buffalo sauce
